attributes.action: support Mordiford School, Herefordshire against closure and re-opening as a completely new school in order to take in extra pupils from a nearby school which may or may not be forced to close
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, are opposed to Herefordshire Council draft plans to close Mordiford CE School, merge it with another, smaller school that may be required to close and re-open again on our site with a whole new identity and staffing structure. We urge the PM to support our campaign against closing one of our county's most successful rural primary schools and to recognise that this process would only be damaging to the existing and future education of pupils at Mordiford School and others across the county.
